questions.question: Should a bicyclist stop at stop signs?
questions.result: YES - Bicyclists need to follow the same rules of the road as other vehicles.

questions.question: While riding your bicycle you should always wear (__________).
Demonstrate the proper hand signal for a left turn.
questions.result: LEFT ARM STRAIGHT OUT POINTING LEFT

questions.question: Is it safe to let a friend ride on the handlebars?
questions.result: NO - And it violates the vehicle code 21204(b) VC

questions.question: While riding at night, your bicycle must have a light and reflectors?
You should wear dark clothes while riding your bicycle at night.
questions.result: NO - Lighter colored clothes make it easier for you to be seen.

questions.question: A bicycle rider can wear headsets over both ears.
questions.result: NO - And it violates the vehicle code 27400 VC

questions.question: Is it okay to leave your bicycle unlocked in your front yard?
questions.result: NO - When not in use, always secure your bicycle with a strong chain and padlock.

questions.question: You should stay in a single file when riding with others.
questions.result: YES - In the bicycle lane if there is one.

questions.question: While riding your bicycle, you should stay alert at all times.
